page.title: Marine
page.content:
918-298-8300

MARINE GRADE PRODUCTS

When you go out, we've got your back.

When youâ€™re dealing with shifting currents, large swells, and
changing tides, the last thing you should worry about
is your winch. Pullmaster has been working for
skippers for over 50 years, making products that you
can trust, and we take that extremely seriously.

Our winches and hoists are designed specifically for
your boat and are built to withstand whatever the seas throw
at them. Marine-grade coatings, corrosion resistant housings, smooth
lowering controls, stainless steel seal lands and rapid reverse are a few
of the reasons that you can rely on our products. We strive to be the
equipment that you never have to think about, one piece of your boat
that just keeps working.

Next

Sign Up For Updates

Stay up-to-date with all of our products and services, as they are released.

Marine Products

Winches

  • 1,000-300,000 lbs (4.4 to 1334.4 kN) line pull
  • Air, hydraulic, or manual clutch
  • Fairleads and cable hold down options

Hoists

  • Dual drive available
  • 5,000-75,000 lbs (22.2-333.6 kN) line pull
  • Smooth or grooved cable drums for wire or synthetic fiber rope
  • Static and drum brakes
  • Line pull and torque available real time
  • Determination of hoist and rope health

Hydraulic pump drives

  • 15 models with multiple gear ratios
  • Up to 1,200 HP (894 kW) and 8 pump pads to SAE standards
  • Multiple input options including a torsional coupling

Gear drives

  • Both planetary and worm gear options with torque ratings of 375-45,000 ft-lbs (.04-61 kNm)
  • Static and dynamic brakes
  • Work area definition and angular rotation feedback options

Slewing ring bearings

  • Single and double row ball bearings up to 6 ft (1.8 m) diameter
  • Bending moment capacity up to 3 M ft-lbs (4 MNm)
  • Option for negative internal clearance
